#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int abs(int x)
{
	return x>0?x:-x;
}
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a[n];
		int sum=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		int newa[n];
		//0123
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			if(2*sum%n==0&&sum%n!=0)
			{
				int mid = n/2;
				int i=mid-1,j=mid;
				newa[i--]=sum/n;
				newa[j++]=sum/n+1;
				while(j<n)
				{
					newa[i] = newa[i+1]-1;
					newa[j] = newa[j-1]+1;
					i--;
					j++;
				}
			} 	
			else
			{
				cout<<"-1\n";
				continue;
			}
			int ans = 0;
			for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{//
			//	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			//{
			//	cout<<a[i]<<" "<<newa[i]<<"\n";
		//		ans+=abs(newa[i]-a[i]);
			
				ans+=abs(newa[i]-a[i]);
			}
			cout<<ans/2<<"\n";
			
		}
		else
		{
			if(sum%n==0)
			{
				int of = 0;
				int mid = n/2;
				while(mid+of<n)
				{
					if(of==0)
						newa[mid+of] = sum/n;
					else
					{
						newa[mid+of] = newa[mid+of-1] + 1;
						newa[mid-of] = newa[mid-of+1] - 1;
						
					}
					of++;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				cout<<"-1\n";
				continue;
			}
			int ans=0;
			for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
			//	cout<<a[i]<<" "<<newa[i]<<"\n";
				ans+=abs(newa[i]-a[i]);
			}
			cout<<ans/2<<"\n";
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
